		Question: what did peter tchaikovsky do
		Answer:
answer:
The answer is: Composer.

Peter Tchaikovsky was a Russian composer. He was born in 1840 and died in 1893. He is considered one of the greatest composers of all time. Tchaikovsky wrote over 40 symphonies, 15 ballets, 11 operas, and many other works. His music is known for its beauty and power.
